0.1.0.name: wordpress/simply-works-core
0.1.0.description: The Simply Works Core - supports eight widgetized areas (one in the header, four in the sidebar, three in the footer). With featured image, custom dropdown menus (2 available), add your logo image, theme options, 9 pre-defined color schemes, and Google Analytics support.  Options to turn off - Comments, Tags, Author, Date, and 'filed under' site wide.  Using supported custom backgrounds and/or header images this theme has 100's of possibilities. The style sheet includes a table of contents for easy customization and this theme is child-theme friendly. Sample child-theme files included. Create a wordpress site that Simply Works! Requires WordPress 3.0 or higher.
